thread.title: BRIEF-Banca Popolare Di Sondrio FY Net Profit Up At EUR 159.2 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Banca Popolare Di Sondrio FY Net Profit Up At EUR 159.2 Mln
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - BANCA POPOLARE DI SONDRIO SCPA:
* FY NET PROFIT EUR 159.2 MILLION VERSUS EUR 98.6 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY INTEREST INCOME EUR 489.9 MILLION VERSUS EUR 474.3 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY NET COMMISSIONS EUR 305.1 MILLION VERSUS EUR 293.1 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY LOAN WRITEDOWNS EUR 231.7 MILLION VERSUS EUR 250.1 MILLION YEAR AGO
* CET1 RATIO AT END-DEC 11.60 PERCENT * GROSS NON PERFORMING LOAN RATIO AT END-DEC 15.07 PERCENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
